item.title: R 绘图中使用中文
item.description: 默认情况下R中绘图不支持中文 绘制图2-1 首先，绘制图2-1(a),代码如下： fiber.absorp=read.csv('~/downloads/data/paper/absorp.csv',sep=',',header = T) absorp.wool=spline(fiber.absorp$RH,fiber.absorp$wool,n=1000) absorp.PP=spline(fiber.absorp$RH,fiber.absorp$PP,n=1000) absorp.cotton=spline(fiber.absorp$RH,fiber.absorp$cotton,n=1000) plot(absorp.wool,col="DarkTurquoise",xlab="Relative Humidity(%)",ylab="hygroscopicity(%)",main="Hygrosopic isotherms of various fibers",type='l',lwd=2) lines(absorp.PP,type='l',lwd=2,col="DeepPink") lines(absorp.cotton,col="RosyBrown",type="l",lwd=2) text.legend=c("wool","cotton","PP") legend("topleft",legend=text.legend,col=c("Darkturquoise","RosyBrown","DeepPink"),text.col=c("Darkturquoise","RosyBrown","DeepPink"),lty=c(1,1,1)) RH,PP,cotton,wool 0,0,0,0 20,0.8,2.5,7.5 40,0.9,4.9,12.3 60,0.92,7.1,14.6 80,0.96,9.2,16.8 100,1.02,12.8,27.2 然后，绘制图2-1(b),代码如下： fiber.temp=read.csv('~/downloads/data/paper/temp.csv',sep=',',header = T) temp.wool=spline(fiber.temp$time,fiber.temp$wool,n=1000) temp.PP=spline(fiber.temp$time,fiber.temp$PP,n=1000) temp.cotton=spline(fiber.temp$time,fiber.temp$cotton,n=1000) plot(temp.wool,col="DarkTurquoise",xlab="Time(min)",ylab="Temperature(deg)",main="Temperature of various fibers",type='l',lwd=2) lines(temp.PP,type='l',lwd=2,col="DeepPink") lines(temp.cotton,type='l',lwd=2,col="RosyBrown") text.legend=c("wool","cotton","PP") legend("topright",legend=text.legend,col=c("Darkturquoise","RosyBrown","DeepPink"),text.col=c("Darkturquoise","RosyBrown","DeepPink"),lty=c(1,1,1)) time,PP,cotton,wool 0,20.0,20.0,20.0 1,20.2,27.0,28.2 2,20.14,26.55,27.87 3,20.12,26.1,27.54 4,20.1,25.65,27.21 5,20.1,25.2,26.76 6,20.1,24.75,26.43 7,20.1,24.3,26.1 8,20.1,23.85,25.77 9,20.1,23.4,25.44 10,20.1,23,25.2 20,20.1,21.6,23.8 30,20.1,21.4,22.9 40,20.1,21.2,22.2 50,20.1,21.1,21.7 60,20.1,21.0,21.5 70,20.1,20.9,21.4 80,20.1,20.86,21.3 90,20.1,20.82,21.2 绘制图3-1 代
